scripts.start: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e localhost -o report/index.json scenarios/signup-and-placement.yml
scripts.import-schooling-registration: npm run import-schooling-registration:generate-bulk-data && npm run import-schooling-registration:build-image && npm run import-schooling-registration:start-environment && npm run import-schooling-registration:prepare-db && npm run import-schooling-registration:launch-test
scripts.import-schooling-registration:prepare-db: cd ../../api && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
